alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 25 at 10:51AM CDT until May 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR WESTERN SIMPSON...NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN...NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE AND CENTRAL COPIAH COUNTIES... At 1050 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Martinsville, or near Hazlehurst, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hazlehurst around 1055 AM CDT. Gallman around 1100 AM CDT. Crystal Springs around 1105 AM CDT. Hopewell around 1110 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Beauregard and Georgetown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
